name: StarTec Investments
overview: StarTec Investments, LLC. is a private venture capital firm founded in 1998 by Joy J. Lindsay and Thomas J. McLeod, Sr. The primary investment focus of StarTec is earlystage technology companies located in Minnesota. StarTec makes investments ranging in size from $100,000 to $500,000. An early stage technology company seeking investment from StarTec needs to have a strong, experienced management team and proprietary technology that serves a large growing market. Representative companies from StarTecâ€™s portfolio include: Compellent Technologies, Gentra Systems, GovDelivery, Inc., Halo Innovations, Hardcore Computer, Inc., Iconoculture, Magnum Technologies, Medisyn Technologies, Pramata Corp., Restore Products, WindLogics and XIOtech.

funding_round.source_description: Medisyn Technologies Closes $1.5 Million Bridge Financing Round.
